actionable_insights: Focus marketing on social media platforms to engage younger adventure-seekers.
Create package deals that include ski passes, thermal springs visits, and traditional dinners to promote local culture.
Highlight guest testimonials and stories about personal experiences in Altai to attract more tourists.
key_insights: Winter tourism in Altai is rising due to its unique culture and natural beauty.
Target family-oriented travelers looking for adventure activities during winter.
Emphasize the relaxation and wellness aspect of thermal springs in marketing materials.
